meanings.definition: A compound containing an ozonide group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ozonide in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The ozonide reacted with another chemical in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The ozonide walked into a bar and ordered a drink.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an ozonide, refreshing and pure.
meanings.sent5: The ozonide shimmered under the bright lights of the laboratory.

meanings.sent1: The ozonide in the atmosphere helps protect us from harmful UV rays.
meanings.sent2: The ozonide layer is crucial for maintaining the balance of our ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The ozonide decided to take a vacation and explore the world.
meanings.sent4: His words carried the weight of an ozonide, powerful and impactful.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the ozonide in nature is truly awe-inspiring.
